root.title: faster test for sickl cell anemia develop
root.body: A team california research say develop well faster test detect sickl cell anemia unborn child exist procedur the test develop cetu corp ctu research requir small amount genet materi fetu produc diagnosi within day unlik test requir sever day do special center say sickl cell anemia pain inherit blood diseas caus normally-flex red blood cell stiffen sickle-lik shape It primarili found black the research say the new england journal medicin `` procedur promis rapid sensit reliabl method prenat diagnosi sickl cell diseas In addit say techniqu might also adapt detect type genet diseas
